DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether gabapentin, as a one time administration prior to a total knee replacement procedure, has opioid sparing effects and a reduction in pain scores.
DOC.brief_title: Preanalgesic Effect of Gabapentin in Total Knee Repair
DOC.criteria: Patients undergoing total knee replacement who received pain management by the following modality: Intravenous patientcontrolled analgesia (IVPCA) opioid Local femoral nerve block with 1.5% mepivacaine 20 ml and 0.5% ropivacaine 20 ml Age < 18 years old
DOC.keyword: Patients undergoing total knee replacement who received pain management by the following modality:
Local femoral nerve block with 1.5% Mepivacaine & 0.5% Ropivacaine
